summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Playfield known as Soundview Playfield, as established by Ordinance No. 82669, situated west of 15th Ave. Northwest and north of West 90th Street; and certain streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6239, and appropriating money from the Seattle Park Improvement Bonds 1960 Fund in aid thereof.
